column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Picked up The Lou. Spinach
column4: and tomatoes. Was a great deep dish pizza. My first in Chicago and first ever. I was referred here by a long time friend and the restaurant and food did not disappoint. I suggest doing online orders as this place was jam packed inside and outside with people all over. Will be sure to come here for my pizza when in town
column5: that's for sure! Great place for the family.
